headline: All You Need to Know About Interpublic (IPG) Rating Upgrade to Buy
summary: Interpublic (IPG) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

headline: Down 10.2% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why You Should You Buy the Dip in Interpublic (IPG)
summary: The heavy selling pressure might have exhausted for Interpublic (IPG) as it is technically in oversold territory now. In addition to this technical measure, strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher indicates that the stock is ripe for a trend reversal.
